items.name: Apple
items.description: A crisp, sweet fruit commonly red or green in color. Rich in fiber and vitamin C.

items.name: Banana
items.description: A soft, sweet fruit with yellow skin. A great source of potassium and energy.

items.name: Mango
items.description: A sweet tropical fruit with juicy flesh, rich in vitamins A and C.

items.name: Pineapple
items.description: A tropical fruit with a sweet and tangy flavor, packed with vitamin C and digestive enzymes.

items.name: Orange
items.description: A citrus fruit known for its refreshing juice and high vitamin C content.

items.name: Pear
items.description: A juicy, sweet fruit with a slightly grainy texture, high in fiber and antioxidants.

items.name: Grapes
items.description: Small, sweet, and juicy berries that come in clusters, packed with antioxidants.

items.name: Avocado
items.description: A creamy and nutritious fruit rich in healthy fats, perfect for salads and spreads.

items.name: Strawberry
items.description: A sweet, red, and juicy berry, rich in vitamin C and antioxidants.

items.name: Watermelon
items.description: A large, refreshing fruit with a high water content, perfect for hot days.

items.name: Carrot
items.description: A crunchy, orange vegetable packed with vitamin A, great for vision and skin health.

items.name: Spinach
items.description: A leafy green vegetable rich in iron, vitamins, and minerals, great for overall health.

items.name: Tomato
items.description: A juicy, red fruit used in many dishes. Rich in antioxidants and vitamin C.

items.name: Cucumber
items.description: A cool, crunchy vegetable, often eaten raw, great for hydration and digestive health.

items.name: Potato
items.description: A starchy root vegetable, versatile in cooking and rich in carbohydrates.

items.name: Onion
items.description: A pungent vegetable used in many dishes to enhance flavor, with numerous health benefits.

items.name: Lettuce
items.description: A leafy green vegetable commonly used in salads, low in calories and high in water content.

items.name: Broccoli
items.description: A green vegetable with a tree-like structure, rich in vitamins K and C.

items.name: Cauliflower
items.description: A white, cruciferous vegetable that is low in calories and high in fiber and antioxidants.

items.name: Zucchini
items.description: A mild-flavored vegetable that can be grilled or eaten raw, rich in vitamins A and C.

items.name: Chicken Breast
items.description: Lean and tender meat, rich in protein, perfect for grilling, frying, or baking.

items.name: Beef Steak
items.description: A flavorful cut of meat, packed with protein, ideal for grilling or pan-searing.

items.name: Pork Chops
items.description: Tender cuts of pork, ideal for grilling or roasting. High in protein and flavor.

items.name: Lamb Shank
items.description: A rich, tender cut of meat, perfect for slow-cooking and packed with flavor.

items.name: Turkey Breast
items.description: A lean, white meat that's perfect for roasting or grilling, rich in protein.

items.name: Fish Fillet
items.description: A versatile and healthy meat, high in omega-3 fatty acids and protein.

items.name: Beef Mince
items.description: Ground beef, perfect for making burgers, meatballs, or spaghetti bolognese.

items.name: Chicken Thighs
items.description: A flavorful cut of chicken, ideal for roasting, frying, or grilling.

items.name: Sausages
items.description: Pork or beef sausages, perfect for grilling or adding to stews and casseroles.

items.name: Goat Meat
items.description: A flavorful and lean meat, commonly used in stews and traditional dishes.
